name: release-downloader
description: GitHub action to download a release tarball.

scripts.prerelease: ncc build -m ./src/index.js && git add . && cross-env-shell changelog --$npm_config_type && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "chore(auto): [NOSTORY] Updated CHANGELOG.md"
scripts.postrelease: git push origin && git push origin --tags --no-verify
